ABOUT.TITLE: My name is Adrien, I'm 20 years old, and I'm currently in computer science engineering school in Reims, France.
ABOUT.DESC:
Future engineer, I am currently working on different web projects using different technologies such as Angular, NodeJS or Laravel. In addition to that, I am interested in the world of video games: I have realized different projects around this field.

I have also developed organizational and communication skills, which allow me to be effective in a team, but also independently.

If you wish to see my resume in PDF format, please find it on this link.
I also created a portfolio : link.

Finally, I wanted to specify that I am looking for an internship taking place abroad (outside of France) from September 2022 for a duration of 4 months.
ABOUT.SHORT_DESC:
Hello, my name is Adrien, I'm 20 years old, and I'm currently in computer science engineering school in Reims, France.
I am currently working on different web projects using different technologies such as Angular, NodeJS or Laravel. In addition to that, I am interested in the world of video games: I have realized different projects around this field.
I have also developed organizational and communication skills, which allow me to be effective in a team, but also independently.

ADEE.NAME: Internship fullStack web developer
ADEE.DESC: Internship during which I had to continue the development of a web application for project management, made in PHP, HTML, CSS and JS. In addition, I had to take care of the migration of their database from mySQL to SQLServer.

FLEXNETWORK.NAME: Internship Angular front-end web developer
FLEXNETWORK.DESC: Internship during which I had to develop the front-end of the 2nd version of their web application using the Angular framework. I communicated with their backend using an API and performed continuous development using the CI-CD tool on GitLab.

CESI.NAME: IT graduate engineering school
CESI.DESC: Wishing to do a Master in computer science, I decided to enter CESI, a computer engineering school. Projects and method "PBL", thanks to all this, CESI allows me to increase in autonomy, skills and group work efficiently.

HOBBIES-DESC.VIDEOGAMES: Big fan of video games, I like to play solo as much as in team like on LOL or CS GO.
HOBBIES-DESC.CRYPTO: I'm interested in crypto-currencies, both financially and technologically
HOBBIES-DESC.PROGRAM: I love developing! Like small programs or then customize games like <u>Minecraft</u>.
HOBBIES-DESC.PIANO: I like to play the piano from time to time.

À l'aide des commandes intégrés au jeu (: Using the game's built-in commands (datapack and command blocks), and with the help of a friend, we made various mini-games in the Minecraft video game.
Réaliser des mini-jeux dans le jeu vidéo: Make mini-games in the video game Minecraft
Inspiré du célèbre jeu Super Smash Bros,:
Inspired by the famous game Super Smash Bros, we made a similar game with our favorite video game characters.

Link from The Legend of Zelda series, Doomfist from the game Overwatch, Edward Kenway from the Assassin's Creed saga or the character from our video game Emergency Exit, we created a total of 10 playable characters with unique abilities!

You can see a demonstration with the attached video.
Pour ce projet, nous avions pour but de:
For this project, we aimed to copy exactly the game Mario Kart.

Going through the construction of the circuits, the reproduction of the karts and the object system, we finally managed to reproduce this game in Minecraft.

Being quite limited, we used pigs as karts for example.

You can see an example of the game via the attached video.
Cette fois-ci, ce jeu n'est certainement:
This time, this game is certainly not known to everyone.SheepWars was a game mode I had discovered on an old Minecraft server. We missed this game, and to test our abilities, we decided to reproduce this old mini-game.

The goal is quite simple: 2 teams compete on a field in which we can get sheep that we can throw and having certain powers.

For example, we have the Incendiary Sheep which is shown in the images to the right, which after some time explodes and spreads fire around it. The final goal: eliminate the entire opposing team!
Réalisé en processing (langage dérivé du: Realized in processing (language derived from java), I realized with a friend (Arthur Joris), a small game from A to Z. This one had to be presented at our BAC, because it represented our final note in ISN (Computer Science and Digital Science).
Emergency Exit est le nom que nous avons:
Emergency Exit is the name we gave to this game. The goal is very simple: to escape.

We wanted to make this game from scratch, so we had to make the gameplay, the images or the physics of the game itself on Processing, a language specialized in graphics.

After several months, we had finally finished our very first video game under the band name "Aidia Info".

This one lasts about 15min, so if the urge strikes you, you can play our game by downloading it with this link (Windows only).
Après avoir terminé le jeu, nous voulion:
After finishing the game, we wanted to go further and decided to burn our game on a CD.

So we made 2 CDs allowing us to keep our game in physical format.
Hébergé sur github, ce premier cv marque: Hosted on github, this first resume marks my beginning in the web world. You can go take a look with this link: https://adrien-syrotnik.github.io/CV-Syrotnik-V1/.
Étant en plein stage concernant Angular,: Being in the middle of an internship concerning Angular, I wanted to change my website and at the same time progress on this framework. So I decided to do it under Angular, although it doesn't reflect the whole framework. A better design, a dark mode and different translations were my main goals for this project.
Un de mes principaux objectifs est de tr: One of my main goals is to work in the field of video games, so I started to make a game where you have to throw stones. Although the game is not too advanced, I have the ambition to make a game later on.
Début d'un jeu sur Unity: Start of a game on Unity
Un test sur le moteur Unity: A test on the Unity engine
Étant très intéressé par le domaine du j:
Being very interested in the field of video games, I was interested in the different game engines existing on the market.

UnrealEngine, CryEngine, Unity, so it's on this last one that I've focused to make a little test game.

The initial idea was that monsters appear in a kind of cave and that our character has to throw projectiles to stop them.

The following video is a demo of what I imagined with what seems to be a goblin and stones as projectiles.
Création d'une application de gestion de:
Created a custom appointment management application on the Laravel framework. The goal of the application was to be able to search for the different appointments as well as the referrals and sponsors linked to them.

The name of the software comes from the person who had asked me for this custom software. Different statistics were available and allowed for additional features that other software, such as Google Calendar, does not offer.
Création d'une API web via nodeJS. Une p: Creation of a web API via nodeJS. A first version was made in Laravel, but it did not succeed. This one should allow to make online purchases and to manage the stocks of a small sales corner integrated in our school and managed by the students (snacks, drinks).
API pour mon école et ses étudiants (Nod: API for my school and its students (NodeJS, Express)
Le but de cette application était de cré: The purpose of this application was to create animations easily. I wanted to animate small ideas easily without any hassle, but I didn't know of any software that could do that, so I decided to create my own.
Créé avec le langage <u>Processing</u>,:
Created with the Processing language, a derivative of Java, the principle is as follows: to be able to create points that can be linked together, then to be able to change their positions in time. Finally, you just have to launch the playback and it's done!

As you can see, I created this little animation opposite, using the software.

If you want to try it, download it here (Windows only).
Souhaitant me mettre au défi, j'ai souha: Wanting to challenge myself, I wanted to make my own minesweeper, an iconic game.
Programmé en <u>Processing</u>, un dériv:
Programmed in Processing, a derivative of Java, I managed to make a 100% functional minesweeper. You can note where the bombs are with right-clicks, and there is also an "anti-bad luck" system to avoid running into a bomb on the first hit.

You can see a preview with the image on the right, but if you want to test my minesweeper, you can download it here (Windows only).

On top of that, I made some scripts to time yourself when you want to do a speedrun.
Souhaitant réaliser un speedrun sur le j: Wishing to realize a speedrun on the game Emergency Exit, and given that the speedrun.com website is very limited, I decided to realize a website which will allow to realize speedruns on this game.
Reproduction du site speedrun.com et réa: Reproduction of the speedrun.com website and creation of speedrun scripts
Un site web : un backend et un frontend: A website: a backend and a frontend
Pour réaliser ce projet, il fallait pouv:
To realize this project, we needed to be able to store the information in a database, so we had to build a backend in addition to the frontend. I decided to build the backend using the Express.js framework, and the frontend using Angular.js.

The frontend also got done in collaboration with Arthur Joris, the same person who developed Emergency Exit with me.

You can find the website via the link below: syrotnik.online/speedrun
Une des problématiques que j'ai rencontr:
One of the problems I encountered when building this project was to be able to make a precise chronometer.

I decided to make a script which allows to make a precise chronometer.

The method consisted in retrieving the addresses of the pointers used by the application, and using them in a script which allows to interpret them and activate or not the chronometer.

I also made a video on this subject: https://youtu.be/TrgG9KnDgK8
Projet réalisé au sein de mon école, l'o: Project realized within my school, the objective of this one was to realize an application allowing to save a file in another one in a totally protected way. During this one, the notions of design pattern, socket and process were deepened.
Stage au cours duquel j'ai repris entièr: Internship during which I took over all the code done by the previous interns. My mission was to finalize the programming of an internal software for the company, allowing the team members to manage the progress of a project. The application was realized in PHP and Javascript.
Stage au cours duquel j'ai pu apprendre: Internship during which I learned how to use the Angular javascript framework and to set up a continuous integration system. My goal was to create a frontend web application that would display content from an API.
